__e: Question is, will that make you any happier?
We think that we animals run the world, but in fact we are very late entrants.
Such are not what they seem by day, but rule the world by night."
Yes, your destiny is to rule and mine is to die for you!
Sure, Paris. Now, I know you think your sugar daddy runs the world, and that includes this paper, and possibly in the past that was true, but not anymore.
We could run the whole country from here. Or even a war if we had to.
